Interface BluetoothLe

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BluetoothLeCentralCallback, BluetoothLePeripheralCallback, MASProximityLoginBLECentralListener

    • Method Detail

      • onStatusUpdate

        void onStatusUpdate(int state)
        Notify the host application for status update.
        Parameters:
        state - The status code corresponding to an BLE_STATE* value defined under BluetoothLeCentralCallback or BluetoothLePeripheralCallback
